item.title: Researchers find 'exquisite' 515-million-year-old fossilized nervous system
item.description:
Researchers find 'exquisite' 515-million-year-old fossilized nervous system

Scientists have unearthed an early Cambrian fossil that displays the creature's nervous system. What makes this find significant? A bluish line dotted with dark splotches runs through newly discovered arthropod fossils from the early Cambrian period. Tiny, thin lines splay out from the black masses.
